scripts.bootstrap: CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=$AWS_ACCOUNT_ID CDK_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION cdk bootstrap && CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=$AWS_ACCOUNT_ID CDK_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_DEFAULT_REGION cdk deploy --timeout 20 --require-approval never --concurrency 10
scripts.launch: if aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name nonstop-main > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Stack exists, running hotswap...' && pnpm hotswap; else echo 'Stack does not exist, running bootstrap...' && pnpm bootstrap; fi
